query:
SELECT mc.id, mc.user_id, mc.region_id, r.name as region_name, mc.is_active 
FROM monitoring_configs mc 
LEFT JOIN regions r ON mc.region_id = r.id 
WHERE mc.is_active = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2LSjgciXE5U7gJN.root --database AE5tzfuADY2nWPRKhfHJC3 --execute SELECT mc.id, mc.user_id, mc.region_id, r.name as region_name, mc.is_active 
FROM monitoring_configs mc 
LEFT JOIN regions r ON mc.region_id = r.id 
WHERE mc.is_active = 1;
